School (district) : North Elementary School (Mountain Home School District)
Role(s) : Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : I am currently helping facilitate a "Ready Kindergarten" program for the parents in  our district. I am current;y teaching the 4-5 age group parents.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would love more strategies to engage students and push them to a higher level of thinking. I think one of the most benficial ways to learn or show your level of understanding is through real-world projects. I would love more knowledge, strategies, tips to better support my students in this way.
